attributes.action: Repeal plans for vaccine passports / certificates to enter venues nationally
attributes.additional_details: Stop plans to impose vaccine passports / certification for the Covid 19 vaccines on a national level as this is coercion to participate in an experimental medical procedure which is not only morally and ethically wrong but also against freedom of choice and human rights. Also the government on many occasions have already stated that this is morally and ethically wrong.
attributes.background: Stop plans to impose vaccine passports / certification in the Autumn for the Covid 19 vaccines nationally.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action:

Do not require Covid vaccination passports for crowded events: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/592671
